title: Web Development
description: High-performance marketing sites, SaaS portals, and dashboards on React/Next.js with SEO and speed baked in.

hero.headline: Fast, Scalable Web Applications
hero.subheadline: High-performance marketing sites, SaaS portals, and dashboards built with React/Next.js, TypeScript, and modern best practices.

benefits.title: Performance-First Architecture
benefits.description: SSR, ISR, and edge delivery strategies that keep pages loading under 2 seconds.

benefits.title: SEO Built-In
benefits.description: Server-side rendering, semantic HTML, structured data, and Core Web Vitals optimization from day one.

benefits.title: Scalable Codebase
benefits.description: Component-driven architecture with TypeScript, clear patterns, and design system integration.

benefits.title: Conversion-Focused UI
benefits.description: Data-driven UX decisions, A/B testing ready, and micro-interactions that guide users to action.

benefits.title: Mobile-First Design
benefits.description: Responsive layouts tested on real devices, progressive enhancement, and touch-optimized interfaces.

benefits.title: Analytics & Observability
benefits.description: Built-in tracking, error monitoring, and performance metrics for continuous improvement.

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: Define requirements, user flows, technical architecture, and success metrics before any code.

process.title: Design & Prototyping
process.description: High-fidelity mockups, interactive prototypes, and design system foundations validated with stakeholders.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: Type-safe React/Next.js development with automated testing, code reviews, and CI/CD pipelines.

process.title: Launch & Optimization
process.description: Deployment to production, performance monitoring, and iterative improvements based on real user data.

ui.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your goals with {{service}}.
